name: DeepChem
short_description: An open-source toolkit for deep learning in drug discovery and quantum chemistry.
long_description: DeepChem is a robust Python library that democratizes deep learning for the life sciences. It offers tools for molecular modeling, cheminformatics, and bioinformatics, enabling researchers to build predictive models for molecular properties and biological activities.

name: Chemprop
short_description: A message-passing neural network for molecular property prediction.
long_description: Chemprop is a machine learning framework for predicting molecular properties using graph neural networks. It is designed to support regression and classification tasks and offers high accuracy across a wide range of chemical datasets.

name: MoleculeNet
short_description: A benchmark for molecular machine learning.
long_description: MoleculeNet provides standardized datasets and evaluation protocols for machine learning on molecular data. It includes diverse datasets for tasks like quantum mechanics, physical chemistry, biophysics, and physiology, making it a key resource for model benchmarking.

name: AutoDock
short_description: A suite of automated docking tools.
long_description: AutoDock is a molecular modeling simulation software especially effective for predicting how small molecules bind to a receptor of known 3D structure. It is widely used in virtual screening and structure-based drug design.

name: RDKit
long_description: RDKit is a collection of cheminformatics and machine learning tools that supports SMILES parsing, substructure search, molecular fingerprints, and more. It integrates well with Python and is commonly used in both academia and industry.

name: AlphaFold
short_description: AI system that predicts protein structures.
long_description: AlphaFold is an AI system developed by DeepMind that predicts the 3D structures of proteins from amino acid sequences. It has revolutionized structural biology and is critical in structure-based drug design and target validation.

name: OpenEye Orion
long_description: OpenEye Orion is a cloud-based computational chemistry platform that supports large-scale modeling, virtual screening, and cheminformatics workflows. It integrates visualization, data management, and high-performance computing capabilities.

name: Schrödinger Suite
short_description: Comprehensive modeling platform for drug design.
long_description: The Schrödinger Suite offers molecular modeling, simulation, and cheminformatics tools that support the entire drug discovery pipeline. It includes capabilities for molecular docking, quantum chemistry, and machine learning-enhanced design.

name: BioSolveIT SeeSAR
long_description: SeeSAR is a visual and interactive platform from BioSolveIT that aids medicinal chemists in structure-based drug design. It enables users to visualize protein-ligand interactions, optimize compounds, and run docking simulations efficiently.

name: IBM RXN for Chemistry
short_description: AI-powered platform for chemical reaction prediction.
long_description: IBM RXN for Chemistry is a cloud-based platform that uses AI to predict chemical reactions, perform retrosynthesis planning, and assist in reaction optimization. It combines transformer models with intuitive user interfaces for chemists.
